summary: Completed comprehensive testing of advocate firm website. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend is 95% functional with excellent UI/UX and proper integration. Only minor issue with country code dropdown selection.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options become not visible after opening, preventing selection of specific country codes
ui_bugs.workaround: Default +1 selection works fine, dropdown opens correctly

passed_tests: Form validation works for required fields
Consultation modal appears on page load
Consultation form submission and backend integration
Message modal opens from contact bar
Message form submission and backend integration
Sticky contact bar with all elements (Email, Call, Instagram, Message)
All main sections visible (Hero, Countries, About, Consultants, Practice Areas, Footer)
9 practice areas section cards display correctly
Hero CTA button reopens consultation modal
Country code dropdown opens and shows options
All data-testid attributes present for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix country code dropdown selection issue - dropdown options become not visible after opening, preventing users from selecting different country codes. This is a minor UI issue that doesn't affect core functionality.
